items.headline: Degreeless.design
items.description: A beautifully curated collection of courses, books, articles and more. Helped me built a foundation in design during my time as a web developer.

items.headline: Refactoring UI
items.description: A great resource by Steve Schoger that taught me a lot about UI design, especially concerning hierarchy and clarity within web apps

items.headline: Design Tools are holding us back
items.description: I am an advocate on diving into code (or adequate no-code tools for that matter) as fast as possible. While Sketch, Figma & Co. have their place, this article explains some shortcomings they might have.

items.headline: Practical Tips for Great UI Animation
items.description: Great talk about micro-interactions, why you should use animation and what properties you could and should animate

items.headline: DuoTone
items.description: Nice little helper tool to create duotones from images so that these images more easily match a design's color.
